eu_initiatives:
REFIT evaluation of the EU legislation on plant protection products and pesticide residues. 
 
CAP monitoring and evaluation indicators 
 
Commission’s draft proposal setting out the criteria to identify pesticides that are endocrine disruptors
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
See my list of publications: https://www.pestizidexperte.de/publikationen.php 
 
and my blog about contaminants in food: https://www.essen-ohne-chemie.info
goals__remit:
Collect data on pesticides (toxicology, residues, impacts, external costs). Research on pesticides (toxicology, residues, impacts, external costs).  
 
Structure results from data collection and reseach. Publication, presentation of results. Development of tools and methods for example: Toxic Load Indicator, Smartphone APP: Essen ohne Chemie. 
 
On-farm pesticide reduction.
